description: With the overwhelming rage from missing last week's project due to Skerryvore, and the drumstick incident of course, it was time for some serious physical pain. There really is no better way to start the year than horizontal blizzard, white box, ice, thick one-step-forward-two-steps-back snow, wind, drenched boots, four layers, two pairs of gloves, and steep off-path ascents. It delivered exactly what we both needed. All for some ass Corbett that we missed five years ago. We didn't even get the second Munro in. But honestly, a Corb', Munro Top, and one Munro was more than enough in the warm embrace of this pain. PMB Monteiths and Joy topped off the day perfectly.
